product.title: What is RedCarga?
product.subtitle: Discover RedCarga, the mobile app created to transform ground freight transport.
product.description: Designed for companies and carriers seeking efficiency, security, and real-time visibility, RedCarga solves the main logistics challenges:

features.preventive: Direct connection between customers and load providers.
features.corrective: Route and cost optimization for greater profitability.
features.predictive: Transparent management with reliable tracking and traceability.

items.description: Send your heavy load requirement with photos. Our AI estimates measurements to speed up quotes.
Receive instant quotes from carriers, compare prices and negotiate details directly via chat.
Monitor your load location via GPS in real-time from the moment of payment. Tracking is mandatory for the carrier.
Make secure payments within the app. Automatically generate all necessary shipping documents.
Access all your past shipments, quotes, payments, and documents. All information backed up in the cloud.

faq.title: Have questions?
faq.subtitle: Here we answer your most frequently asked questions.

questions.question: How is the security of my load guaranteed?
questions.answer: We guarantee security with validated carriers and mandatory GPS tracking in real-time. Additionally, payment is managed securely through the app and is only released to the carrier after confirming delivery.

questions.question: What is the process for sending heavy load?
questions.answer: The process begins by creating a request in the app, where you register the type of load, photos that allow measurements to be estimated using AI, weight, and the route from origin to destination, including intermediate points. Within minutes, you receive real-time quotes from verified carriers and choose the one you prefer to start a deal with chat enabled. The formalisation is done with payment within the app; at that moment, the mandatory documents (Waybill and Carrier Guide) are automatically generated. During the journey, the cargo is tracked by GPS in real time until delivery confirmation.

questions.question: Why should I use RedCarga instead of a traditional process?
questions.answer: RedCarga integrates instant quotes, automatic documentation and complete traceability in one place, eliminating calls, paperwork and opacity in prices and statuses. Payments are managed securely within the app and are only released to the carrier after delivery confirmation, reducing risks. In addition, the reputation system and direct chat with the supplier provide greater transparency and operational control than traditional methods.

questions.question: What type of carriers and routes does the platform cover?
questions.answer: The platform brings together verified companies and carriers operating interprovincial routes in Peru, including journeys with intermediate stops. It handles general and specialised cargo (agro-industrial, machinery, materials, among others) and allows for both one-off shipments and recurring operations. The matching engine assigns each request to the providers with the most suitable capacity and route to optimise time and costs.
